alert.note: Alert for Clay; Fillmore; Greeley; Hamilton; Howard; Merrick; Nance; Nuckolls; Polk; Thayer; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 2:31PM CST until December 15 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM CST FOR EASTERN GREELEY...EASTERN CLAY...EASTERN NUCKOLLS...NANCE... YORK...HAMILTON...FILLMORE...THAYER...MERRICK...POLK AND NORTHEASTERN HOWARD COUNTIES... At 229 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Greeley to near Hordville to near Byron, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Polk and Hordville around 235 PM CST. Clarks around 240 PM CST. Hebron and Stromsburg around 245 PM CST. Osceola, Silver Creek, Belvidere and Gilead around 250 PM CST. Bruning and Alexandria around 255 PM CST. Ohiowa around 300 PM CST. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Thayer. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 325 and 365. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for south central, central and east central Nebraska. Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Fillmore; Greeley; Hamilton; Howard; Merrick; Nance; Nuckolls; Polk; Thayer; York
